dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 2665 IH: Supporting Safety Net Hospitals Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Clarke of New York (for herself, Mr. Crenshaw, Ms. DeGette, and Mr. Burgess) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to delay certain disproportionate share hospital payment reductions under the Medicaid program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Supporting Safety Net Hospitals Act.

section.header: Delaying certain disproportionate share hospital payment reductions under the Medicaid program
section.text: Section 1923(f)(7)(A) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C.1396r–4(f)(7)(A)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in clause (i), in the matter preceding subclause (I), by striking 2024 and inserting 2026; and
in clause (ii), by striking 2024 and inserting 2026.
